resources.string: This function will take the coordinates of the current position and the selected station, this will be used to coordinate the user to the station without getting lost or using an another map. This button will be removed later.
From this station you can buy tickets!
Send a SMS to the number 7479 for a ticket.\nThis offer is only valid in mobile networks Vodafone, Orange and Digi Mobil.
For a subscription for 45 minutes on a urban line of Cluj-Napoca, send a message with the line number to 7479 at a cost of this ticket is 0.5 Euro + VAT.
For a subscription for 60 minutes on all urban lines of Cluj-Napoca, send a message with the letter T to 7479 at a cost of 0.9 Euro + VAT.
For a subscription for 24 hours on all urban lines of Cluj-Napoca, send a message with the letter A to 7479 at a cost of 2.6 Euro + VAT.
For a subscription for 40 minutes on all metropolitan and urban lines of Cluj-Napoca, send a message with the text M40 to 7479 at a cost of 0.9 Euro + VAT.
For a subscription for 60 minutes on all metropolitan and urban lines of Cluj-Napoca, send a message with the text M60 to 7479 at a cost of 1.35 Euro + VAT.
For a subscription for 80 minutes on all metropolitan and urban lines of Cluj-Napoca, send a message with the text M80 to 7479 at a cost of 1.8 Euro + VAT.
For a subscription for 24 hours on all metropolitan and urban lines of Cluj-Napoca, send a message with the text MA to 7479 at a cost of 4 Euro + VAT.
More info will be added in the future updates.
This ticket is bought from a counter and it is used for 2 trips on any line, the price is 4 RON/LEI.
This ticket is bought from a machine and it is used for one trip on any line, the price is 2 RON/LEI.
Scroll to the right and left to see more lines.
